data.name: Inward Journey
data.detailed_description:
About Inward

  • A game about self-discovery and personal growth through mindfulness and meditation
  • Discover and grow new species of trees that reflect your journey
  • Transform a world and choose how it evolves over time
  • Build habits that leave a lasting positive impact on your wellbeing

Travel to a world within

You found a small beautiful rock perched next to an old oak tree. You brought it home and threw it on your table, next to all the other rocks that you found beautiful. But as you slept, this rock spoke to you and took you to a place within.

Discover and Grow Trees that Reflect Your Personal Journey

Hundreds of thousands of species of trees are waiting to be discovered. Choose the type of trunk, the branches and the leaves to create and name your own unique species of trees. Other players can discover your trees and together you can bring back all the trees that once used to thrive in Inward.

Grow your world, choose how it evolves

The game world will grow and transform with you as you continue visiting Inward. In time, you'll also get to choose how the world evolves.

Would you like a world that looks green and where foxes live?
Or would you like a world that looks more magical, with fireflies and birds?

It's up to you ...

Choose Your Path of Self-Discovery and Growth


Meditations that help you discover mindfulness and insight. The audio guidance adjusts to your session duration and your experience, with the aim of helping you to become self-reliant.

  • Path of the earth helps to develop a focused and one-pointed mind.
  • Path of Insight helps you better understand yourself and to grow your insight.
  • Path of water helps you gain clarity by practising open and free expression.
  • Path of air helps you connect to your physiology to help build calm and resilience.

data.short_description: Travel within, and uncover a beautiful world that grows with you. Build a daily habit of mindfulness and learn ways to care for your mental wellbeing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel core i3-2100T @ 2.5GHz/AMD FX 6100, or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650Ti 2GB, AMD Radeon HD 7750 2GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570K; AMD Ryzen 3 1300x or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960; AMD R9 290 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
